topic.title: Desktop workspace UI page for Private Client
topic.shortdesc: Desktop workspace for Private Client is a user interface starting page that is designed for Private Client role and runs on all desktop platforms. The workspace is opened as Private Clients login to the internet banking application. Private Clients manage their banking operations within workspace.

body.p: The Desktop workspace is opened as Private Clients login to the internet banking application and consist of Menu bar and a placeholder for your desired UI page. Usually, as you login to an internet banking, Introduction or Overview UI page is opened.

Desktop Private clients UI workspace has its menu bar that consist of following elements:
Overview button switch you to Overview UI page. Usually, the page is opened as you login to you internet banking application. To get more information go to
Your Products is a drop down menu list that provides access to your banking product's UI pages: Domestic Account, Card, etc.. To get more information go to specific product's UI pages:
Extensions is a drop down menu list that provides access to additional banking application . To get more information go to:
Discover button switch you to Discover UI page that describes all banking products to purchase. To get more information go to:
FIT button switch you to FIT UI page. To get more information go to:
Contact button switch you to FIT UI page. To get more information go to:
Messages button switch you to Messages UI page. To get more information go to:
Configuration button switch you to Configuration UI page. To get more information go to:
Logout button turns off your internet banking application and redirect you to bank website. If you stay passive withing your workspace more than setted time period you'll be logout automatically for the security reasons.
